Detailed Description

Type: Class

Purpose: This is the base CMM xform object. A general static creation function, base behavior, and data are defined. The Create() function will assign a profile to the class. The CIccProfile object will then be owned by the xform object and later deleted when the IccXform is deleted.

void CIccXform::AdjustPCS ( icFloatNumber *  DstPixel,
const icFloatNumber *  SrcPixel 
) const
protected

Name: CIccXform::AdjustPCS

Purpose: This function will take care of any PCS adjustments needed by the xform (the PCS is always version 4 relative).

Args: DstPixel = Destination pixel where the result is stored, SrcPixel = Source pixel which is to be applied.

References icSigLabData, CIccPCS::Lab2ToXyz(), CIccPCS::LabToXyz(), CIccPCS::NegClip(), CIccPCS::XyzToLab(), and CIccPCS::XyzToLab2().

icStatusCMM CIccXform::Begin ( )
virtual

Name: CIccXform::Begin

Purpose: This function will be called before the xform is applied. Derived objects should also call this base class function to initialize for Absolute Colorimetric Intent handling which is performed through the use of the CheckSrcAbs and CheckDstAbs functions.

Reimplemented in CIccXformMpe, CIccXformNamedColor, CIccXformNDLut, CIccXform4DLut, CIccXform3DLut, CIccXformMatrixTRC, and CIccXformMonochrome.

References CIccTag::GetType(), icAbsoluteColorimetric, icCmmStatIncorrectApply, icCmmStatInvalidProfile, icCmmStatOk, icPerceptual, icPerceptualRefBlackX, icPerceptualRefBlackY, icPerceptualRefBlackZ, icPerceptualRefWhiteX, icPerceptualRefWhiteY, icPerceptualRefWhiteZ, icSigAbstractClass, icSigMediaWhitePointTag, icSigXYZType, IsSpacePCS, and CIccProfile::ReadTags().

Referenced by CIccXformMonochrome::Begin(), CIccXformMatrixTRC::Begin(), CIccXform3DLut::Begin(), CIccXform4DLut::Begin(), CIccXformNDLut::Begin(), CIccXformNamedColor::Begin(), and CIccXformMpe::Begin().

void CIccXform::CheckDstAbs ( icFloatNumber *  Pixel) const
protected

Name: CIccXform::CheckDstAbs

Purpose: This function will be called by a derived CIccXform object's Apply() function AFTER the actual xform is performed to take care of Absolute to Relative adjustments needed by the xform (IE the PCS is always version 4 relative).

Args: Pixel = source pixel data which will be modified

const icFloatNumber * CIccXform::CheckSrcAbs ( CIccApplyXform *  pApply,
const icFloatNumber *  Pixel 
) const
protected

Name: CIccXform::CheckSrcAbs

Purpose: This function will be called by a derived CIccXform object's Apply() function BEFORE the actual xform is performed to take care of Absolute to Relative adjustments needed by the xform (IE the PCS is always version 4 relative).

Args: Pixel = src pixel data (will not be modified)

Return: returns Pixel or adjusted pixel data.

References CIccApplyXform::m_AbsLab.

CIccXform * CIccXform::Create ( CIccProfile *  pProfile,
bool  bInput = true,
icRenderingIntent  nIntent = icUnknownIntent,
icXformInterp  nInterp = icInterpLinear,
icXformLutType  nLutType = icXformLutColor,
bool  bUseMpeTags = true,
CIccCreateXformHintManager *  pHintManager = NULL 
)
static

Note: The returned CIccXform will own the profile.

Name: CIccXform::Create

Purpose: This is a static Creation function that creates derived CIccXform objects and initializes them.

Args: pProfile = pointer to a CIccProfile object that will be owned by the transform. This object will be destroyed when the returned CIccXform object is destroyed. The means that the CIccProfile object needs to be allocated on the heap. bInput = flag to indicate whether to use the input or output side of the profile, nIntent = the rendering intent to apply to the profile, nInterp = the interpolation algorithm to use for N-D luts. nLutType = selection of which transform lut to use bUseMpeTags = flag to indicate the use MPE flags if available pHintManager = pointer to object that contains xform creation hints

Return: A suitable pXform object

References CIccCreateXformHintManager::AddHint(), icHeader::colorSpace, CIccXformCreator::CreateXform(), CIccCreateNamedColorXformHint::csDevice, CIccCreateNamedColorXformHint::csPcs, CIccCreateXformHintManager::DeleteHint(), icHeader::deviceClass, CIccProfile::FindTag(), CIccTag::GetType(), icAbsoluteColorimetric, icPerceptual, icRelativeColorimetric, icSig3colorData, icSig4colorData, icSigAToB0Tag, icSigBToA0Tag, icSigBToD0Tag, icSigBToD1Tag, icSigCmyData, icSigCmykData, icSigDToB0Tag, icSigDToB1Tag, icSigGamutTag, icSigGrayData, icSigHlsData, icSigHsvData, icSigLabData, icSigLinkClass, icSigLuvData, icSigMultiProcessElementType, icSigNamedColor2Tag, icSigPreview0Tag, icSigRgbData, icSigXYZData, icSigYCbCrData, icSigYxyData, icUnknownIntent, icXformLutColor, icXformLutGamut, icXformLutNamedColor, icXformLutPreview, icXformType3DLut, icXformType4DLut, icXformTypeMatrixTRC, icXformTypeMonochrome, icXformTypeMpe, icXformTypeNamedColor, icXformTypeNDLut, CIccTag::IsSupported(), CIccProfile::m_Header, icHeader::pcs, and SetParams().

Referenced by CIccCmm::AddXform(), and CIccNamedColorCmm::AddXform().

CIccXform * CIccXform::Create ( CIccProfile &  Profile,
bool  bInput = true,
icRenderingIntent  nIntent = icUnknownIntent,
icXformInterp  nInterp = icInterpLinear,
icXformLutType  nLutType = icXformLutColor,
bool  bUseMpeTags = true,
CIccCreateXformHintManager *  pHintManager = NULL 
)
static

Note: Provide an interface to work profile references. The IccProfile is copied, and the copy's ownership is turned over to the Returned CIccXform object.

Name: CIccXform::Create

Purpose: This is a static Creation function that creates derived CIccXform objects and initializes them.

Args: Profile = reference to a CIccProfile object that will be used to create the transform. A copy of the CIccProfile object will be created and passed to the pointer based Create(). The copied object will be destroyed when the returned CIccXform object is destroyed. bInput = flag to indicate whether to use the input or output side of the profile, nIntent = the rendering intent to apply to the profile, nInterp = the interpolation algorithm to use for N-D luts. nLutType = selection of which transform lut to use bUseMpeTags = flag to indicate the use MPE flags if available pHint = pointer to object passed to CIccXform creation functionality

Return: A suitable pXform object

References CIccProfile.

icColorSpaceSignature CIccXform::GetDstSpace ( ) const
virtual

Returns the destination color space of the transform.

Name: CIccXformMatrixTRC::GetDstSpace

Purpose: Return the color space that is output by the transform. If a device space is either XYZ/Lab it is changed to dXYZ/dLab to avoid confusion with PCS encoding of these spaces. Device encoding of XYZ and Lab spaces left to the device.

Reimplemented in CIccXformNamedColor.

References icSigAbstractClass, icSigDevLabData, icSigDevXYZData, icSigLabData, and icSigXYZData.

Referenced by CIccPCS::Check().

CIccApplyXform * CIccXform::GetNewApply ( icStatusCMM &  status)
virtual

Name: CIccXform::GetNewApply

Purpose: This Factory function allocates data specific for the application of the xform. This allows multiple threads to simultaneously use the same xform.

Reimplemented in CIccXformMpe.

References icCmmStatAllocErr, and icCmmStatOk.

icColorSpaceSignature CIccXform::GetSrcSpace ( ) const
virtual

Returns the source color space of the transform.

Name: CIccXformMatrixTRC::GetSrcSpace

Purpose: Return the color space that is input to the transform. If a device space is either XYZ/Lab it is changed to dXYZ/dLab to avoid confusion with PCS encoding of these spaces. Device encoding of XYZ and Lab spaces left to the device.

Reimplemented in CIccXformNamedColor.

References icSigAbstractClass, icSigDevLabData, icSigDevXYZData, icSigLabData, and icSigXYZData.
